definition: needless to say/it goes without saying
to wait/to treat/to deal with/to need/going to (do sth)/about to/intending to

sentences.english: Men, the name of this article truly speaks for itself.
sentences.chinese: 男人，這篇文章真正的名字自不待言。

sentences.english: We need not tell you that continuity of offers is very important.
sentences.chinese: 報盤的連續不斷非常重要，自不待言。

sentences.english: Salt is necessary for human being's daily life, and its importance goes without saying.
sentences.chinese: 鹽爲日常生活所必需之物，其重要性自不待言。

sentences.english: It was a simpler age, to say the least.
sentences.chinese: 自不待言，這是一個單純的年代。

sentences.english: The fact or quality of being diverse; difference.
sentences.chinese: 貓不喜歡水是自不待言的事實。

sentences.english: So far as these three aspects are concerned, the role of the World Expo is self-evident.
sentences.chinese: 世博會在這三方面的表現自不待言。

sentences.english: It speaks for itself that that will accelerate the social evolution, " the Belgian said."
sentences.chinese: 自不待言，這將會加快中國的社會演變，“該報說。

sentences.english: Encouraging management, particularly the importance of human resources management to mention.
sentences.chinese: 激勵對管理特別是人力資源管理的重要性自不待言。

sentences.english: It goes without saying that the time at our disposal is unusually limited.
sentences.chinese: 自不待言，我們自己可以支配的時間極其有限。

definition: it goes to show that/one can see
to make reference to/to write about
that being the case/then/in that case
so much so that/to the extent that/even
